title: Infant mortality rate in Malawi 2018
summary: Overall Deaths per 1,000 live births has decreased over the Year.
Deaths per 1,000 live births is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Deaths per 1,000 live births, about 45.2 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Deaths per 1,000 live births, of value 35.3 was reported at Year 2018
